model
Interface Statistics

All Known Implementing Classes:
StatisticsImp
public interface Statistics

An interface for the statistics model for the TTT system. Keeps track of wins, losses, and ties for each player in a game.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Benjamin Pellittieri and Christopher Pauliks for Mustache Cash Stash

Method Summary
